page.title: 17RELIGION
page.content: There are four churches in Knighton and they are St Edwards Church,Baptist Chapel,Methodist Chapel and Catholic Church. St Edwards Church is a Church in Wales church and was built between 1100 and 1135.Many parts of it has been rebuilt since.The vicar of St Edwards is also the vicar of Norton Church. The Roman Catholic Church was built in 1972.It is a very modern building and is the smallest Church in Knighton. The Baptist Chapel is in Norton Street and was built at the beginning of the nineteenth century. The Methodist Chapel was demolished in 1984.The members of the Chapel have now purchased the Victoria Hall,which was once a Chapel,and hold their services there.
